articles.title: BBVA and OpenAI collaborate to transform global banking
articles.summary: BBVA has partnered with OpenAI to revolutionize global banking by integrating AI technology into its operations, aiming to enhance customer experiences and improve efficiency. This collaboration is expected to bring about significant innovations in areas such as customer service, risk management, and financial analysis. By leveraging OpenAI's cutting-edge technology, BBVA seeks to stay ahead of the curve in the rapidly evolving banking landscape.

articles.title: Advancing science and math with GPT-5.2
articles.summary: Researchers are leveraging the power of GPT-5.2 to accelerate breakthroughs in science and math, using its advanced capabilities to analyze complex data and identify patterns. This innovative approach has the potential to revolutionize fields such as physics, biology, and mathematics, enabling scientists to make new discoveries and solve complex problems more efficiently. By combining human expertise with AI-driven insights, GPT-5.2 is poised to drive significant advancements in these critical fields.

articles.title: The Walt Disney Company and OpenAI reach landmark agreement to bring beloved characters to Sora
articles.summary: The Walt Disney Company has partnered with OpenAI to integrate its iconic characters into Sora, a cutting-edge AI platform. This landmark agreement will enable the creation of immersive experiences featuring Disney's beloved characters, pushing the boundaries of interactive storytelling. By combining Disney's rich intellectual property with OpenAI's innovative technology, the collaboration is poised to revolutionize the entertainment industry.

articles.title: Increasing revenue 300% by bringing AI to SMBs
articles.summary: A new initiative aims to boost revenue for small to medium-sized businesses (SMBs) by integrating artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, with a goal of increasing revenue by 300%. This innovative approach can help level the playing field for SMBs, enabling them to compete with larger enterprises. By leveraging AI, SMBs can streamline operations, enhance customer experiences, and drive business growth.

articles.title: Introducing GPT-5.2
articles.summary: Researchers have unveiled GPT-5.2, a significant upgrade to the GPT series, boasting enhanced language understanding and generation capabilities. This new model is expected to revolutionize natural language processing tasks, such as text summarization and conversation systems. With GPT-5.2, developers can create more sophisticated and human-like AI applications, transforming the way we interact with technology.

articles.title: Deepening our partnership with the UK AI Security Institute
articles.summary: A leading tech company has announced a partnership with the UK AI Security Institute to enhance AI security capabilities. This collaboration aims to develop innovative solutions to combat emerging threats and improve the overall security landscape. The partnership is expected to drive significant advancements in AI-powered security technologies, benefiting both organizations and individuals.

articles.title: Strengthening our partnership with the UK government to support prosperity and security in the AI era
articles.summary: A leading tech company has announced a strengthened partnership with the UK government to drive prosperity and security in the age of AI. This collaboration aims to harness AI's potential to boost economic growth, improve public services, and enhance national security. By working together, the company and the UK government seek to establish the country as a global leader in responsible AI development and deployment.

articles.title: FACTS Benchmark Suite: Systematically evaluating the factuality of large language models
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced the FACTS Benchmark Suite, a comprehensive evaluation tool to assess the factuality of large language models, helping to identify and improve their accuracy and reliability. This suite systematically tests models' ability to distinguish between factual and non-factual information, a crucial step in developing more trustworthy AI systems. By using FACTS, developers can refine their models to provide more accurate and informative responses.

articles.title: Engineering more resilient crops for a warming climate
articles.summary: Scientists are developing more resilient crops to combat the challenges of a warming climate, using advanced engineering techniques to enhance their ability to withstand extreme temperatures and weather conditions. This innovation has the potential to improve global food security and reduce crop losses due to climate change. By creating climate-resilient crops, researchers aim to ensure a more sustainable food supply for future generations.

articles.title: AlphaFold: Five years of impact
articles.summary: AlphaFold, a revolutionary AI protein-folding model, has made significant impacts in the scientific community over the past five years, accelerating discoveries in fields like medicine and biology. Its ability to accurately predict protein structures has enabled breakthroughs in disease research and drug development. By solving a 50-year-old problem in biology, AlphaFold has opened up new avenues for scientific inquiry and innovation.

articles.title: New in llama.cpp: Model Management
articles.summary: The latest update to llama.cpp introduces model management, allowing users to easily switch between different AI models and fine-tune their performance. This innovation enables more flexibility and customization, making it simpler for developers to integrate AI capabilities into their projects. With this update, llama.cpp continues to advance as a cutting-edge open-source AI framework.

articles.title: Codex is Open Sourcing AI models
articles.summary: Codex, a cutting-edge AI platform, is open-sourcing its AI models, allowing developers to access and build upon its innovative technology. This move is expected to accelerate AI research and development, enabling the creation of more sophisticated and customized AI solutions. By making its models open-source, Codex is democratizing access to AI and paving the way for breakthroughs in various industries.

articles.title: Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker: Cost-efficient Frontier Multimodal Performance
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker, a cost-efficient AI model that achieves frontier multimodal performance, enabling efficient processing of various data types such as text, images, and audio. This innovation has the potential to improve applications like chatbots, virtual assistants, and content generation. By reducing computational costs, Apriel-1.6-15b-Thinker makes multimodal AI more accessible and affordable for a wide range of industries.

articles.title: Introducing swift-huggingface: The Complete Swift Client for Hugging Face
articles.summary: The swift-huggingface library offers a comprehensive Swift client for Hugging Face, enabling developers to seamlessly integrate the popular AI model hub into their iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS apps. This innovation allows for easy access to a vast range of pre-trained models, streamlining the development of AI-powered applications. By bridging the gap between Hugging Face and Swift, developers can now leverage the power of AI models in their Apple ecosystem projects.

articles.title: DeepMath: A lightweight math reasoning Agent with smolagents
articles.summary: DeepMath is a cutting-edge, lightweight math reasoning agent that leverages smolagents to solve complex mathematical problems with increased efficiency. This innovative technology has the potential to revolutionize the field of mathematics and AI, enabling more accurate and rapid problem-solving. By utilizing smolagents, DeepMath can provide step-by-step reasoning and explanations, making it a valuable tool for education and research.

articles.title: After 27 years within budget Austria open 6thlongest railway tunnel in the world
articles.summary: Austria has inaugurated the 6th longest railway tunnel in the world, a 56km tunnel that connects the cities of Graz and Klagenfurt, after 27 years of construction within budget. This engineering feat is expected to reduce travel time and increase freight capacity, boosting the regional economy. The tunnel is a significant milestone in European rail infrastructure, enhancing connectivity and sustainability.

articles.title: GPT-5.2
articles.summary: Researchers have unveiled GPT-5.2, a significant upgrade to the GPT series, boasting improved language understanding and generation capabilities. This new model is expected to enhance various AI applications, such as chatbots and content creation tools. With its increased performance, GPT-5.2 has the potential to revolutionize human-computer interaction and automate complex tasks more effectively.

articles.title: Guarding My Git Forge Against AI Scrapers
articles.summary: A developer is taking measures to protect their Git Forge repository from AI-powered scrapers that can exploit open-source code. To counter this, they're implementing rate limiting, IP blocking, and other security measures to prevent unauthorized access. This highlights the growing concern of AI scrapers targeting open-source codebases, emphasizing the need for robust repository security.

articles.title: CRISPR fungus: Protein-packed, sustainable, and tastes like meat
articles.summary: Scientists have engineered a CRISPR fungus that produces high amounts of protein, offering a sustainable and meat-like alternative to traditional livestock. This innovative fungus has the potential to revolutionize the food industry by providing a more environmentally friendly and efficient source of protein. With its meat-like taste and texture, it could become a game-changer for the plant-based meat market.

articles.title: The Walt Disney Company and OpenAI Partner on Sora
articles.summary: The Walt Disney Company has partnered with OpenAI on a project called Sora, aiming to revolutionize content creation with AI-powered tools. This collaboration will enable Disney to leverage OpenAI's cutting-edge technology to generate new ideas, automate tasks, and enhance the overall storytelling experience. By combining Disney's creative expertise with OpenAI's innovative capabilities, Sora has the potential to transform the entertainment industry.

articles.title: French supermarket's Christmas advert is worldwide hit (without AI) [video]
articles.summary: A French supermarket's heartwarming Christmas advert has gone viral worldwide, showcasing the power of traditional storytelling without relying on AI-generated content. The ad's emotional resonance and authenticity have resonated with viewers globally, highlighting the importance of human touch in advertising. The video's massive success demonstrates that sometimes, simplicity and genuine emotion can be more effective than cutting-edge technology.
